item.title: Plotting fieldwork with mapview
item.description: While I’m learning how to build a Hugo website with the blogdown package in R, I thought I’d share this code for generating an interactive leaflet map. It has a choropleth overlay representing the number of weeks of archaeological fieldwork I’ve done in each US county. To make this map, I am relying on Tim Applehans’ incredibly helpful R package mapview.
